price: Allah azi icyo buri kigore gifite muri nyababyeyi, (akanamenya) ibivuka bidashyitse ndetse n’ibisagiza (ibirenza igihe). Kandi iwe buri kintu cyose gifite igipimo.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَحۡمِلُ كُلُّ أُنثَىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامُ وَمَا تَزۡدَادُۚ وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٍ عِندَهُۥ بِمِقۡدَارٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaʿlamu mā taḥmilu kullu unthā wamā taghīḍu al-arḥāmu wamā tazdādu wakullu shayin ʿindahu bimiq'dārin
